thread.title_full: Doctor Who series 9: 10 exciting teasers for 'Before the Flood' - Doctor Who News - Cult - Digital Spy

author: Morgan Jeffery
title: Doctor Who series 9: 10 exciting teasers for 'Before the Flood' - Doctor Who Cult -
text: Doctor Who wraps up its second two-parter of the year on Saturday night, and here's a few spoiler-free hints as to what you can expect from 'Before the Flood'.Separated from Clara (Jenna Coleman) by hundreds of years, the Doctor (Peter Capaldi) must find a way to defeat death itself - and face down a terrifying new nemesis, the Fisher King... Â© BBC Who is Patrick Ness, writer of new Doctor Who spinoff Class?1. The guitar is back.2. "Google it."3. A few old companions get a name-check.4. "You've made yourself essential to me."5. There's (arguably) some breaking of the fourth wall.6. "I'm a dead man walking."7. One scene involving the Doctor feels terribly familiar - until it's brilliantly subverted. 8. "You can't cheat time."9. Her time in the TARDIS has changed Clara - but for better or worse? 10. "This world is protected - by me."Doctor Who continues this Saturday (October 10) at 8.25pm on BBC OneDoctor Who reveals the terrifying Fisher King in new picturesDoctor Who review: 'Under the Lake' is atmospheric but flawedWatch Digital Spy's video review of last Saturday's Doctor Who below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4526411584001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14526411584001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4526411584001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4526411584001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14526411584001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4526411584001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
